channel.title: All monster attack the players
channel.description: Hm i have added monster id 63 the deadly red spider now it attacking any one there come near it how to fix that i have try seach for it. cant find it. please help me !

item.title: All monster attack the players
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

What…?
Are you trying to say deadly red spiders attack anybody who walks by? Just search for its id (63), the rest is common sense. Remove the ID from anything that looks like it means ‘attack’.

Read full topic
